Invocation Name: smatrix pulse
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pre-link procedures:
1. Ensure that the Smatrix Pulse control system is completely installed and commissioned.
2. The Communications Module must be installed on the network and cloud enabled (available for remote access).
3. Install the Smatrix Pulse APP on the smart phone and setup the remote access account.
4. Thermostats must be named in the Smatrix Pulse APP Room Settings > Room Name. Select from pulldown for all thermostats!
5. Ensure that Alexa/Echo is setup and operating. 

Adding Smatrix Pulse skill to Alexa:
1. Open the Alexa App and tap the Skills & Games on the side navigation.
2. Tap the magnifying glass icon and search for Smatrix Pulse.
3. Select Smatrix Pulse from the list.
4. Tap ENABLE TO USE.
5. Give your Smatrix account username and password on the activation page to link your Alexa profile and your Smatrix device. 

Once the Smatrix Pulse Skill has been added, try the skill with:
1. Say ‘Alexa, ask Smatrix Pulse for Help’
2. Alexa will say ‘Welcome to Smatrix Pulse by Uponor! Be sure your Smatrix device is set up and your account is linked before using the Smatrix Pulse skill. Once setup, you can ask me for the status of a room. Or ask me for the temperature of a room. Or, if you’d like you can ask me to make a room hotter. Or ask me to make a room colder. I also understand directions like increase, decrease, up, and down. You can also ask me to change the system mode between Home and Away. Or you can ask me what the mode is set to. What would you like me to do?’
3. Say ‘Alexa Cancel’.
